2D Graph Properties

Requires: Base Development System

Property Description
Annotation:Annotation List Returns an array of information about all annotations. Details
Cursor:Active Cursor Gets and sets the active cursor and sets properties and methods on the active cursor. Details
Cursor:Name Displays text that is associated with the cursor in the plot area. Details
Cursor:Color Sets the color of the cursor, including its point, arrow, and name. Details
Cursor:Style Draws the symbol at the focal point of the cursor in combination with Point Style. Details
Cursor:Point Style Draws the symbol at the focal point of the cursor in combination with Style. Details
Cursor:Name Visible If TRUE, displays the cursor name in the plot area. Details
Cursor:Allow Drag If TRUE, allows you to drag the cursor. Details
Cursor:Mode Specifies the way the cursor snaps to the plots in the plot area. Details
Cursor:Plot Specifies the plot associated with the cursor. Details
Cursor:Index Specifies the array index of the point where the cursor snaps. Details
Cursor:Position Specifies the position of the cursor in terms of XY coordinates. Details
Cursor:X Scale Sets the x-scale of the cursor. Details
Cursor:Y Scale Sets the y-scale of the cursor. Details
Cursor:Watch Plots Specifies the array that contains the indexes of the plots that the cursor watches when the Watch All Plots property is set to FALSE. Details
Cursor:Watch All Plots If TRUE, sets the cursor to watch all plots in the plot area. Details
Cursor:Plot Area Specifies the plot area associated with the cursor. Details
Cursor:Label Offset Sets the coordinates of the label position relative to the cursor. Details
Cursor:Selection Color Sets the color of the cursor row selected in the cursor legend. Details
Cursor:Line Style Specifies the style of the line that displays the active cursor. Details
Cursor:Line Width Specifies the width of the line used to display the active cursor. Details
Cursor:Visible Shows the cursor. Details
Graph:Graph Legend Visible Shows the graph legend. Details
Graph:Plot Legend Visible Shows the plot legend. Details
Graph:Plot Legend Auto Size If TRUE, resizes the plot legend to the width of the longest plot name visible in the legend. Details
Graph:Plot Legend Number Sets the number of rows in the plot legend. Details
Graph:X Scrollbar Visible Displays the x-axis scroll bar for the graph or chart. Details
Graph:Scale Legend Visible Shows the scale legend. Details
Graph:Cursor Legend Visible Displays the cursor legend. Details
Graph:Plot FG Color Specifies the foreground color of the plot area. Details
Graph:Plot BG Color Specifies the background color of the plot area. Details
Graph:Bounds Width Specifies the width of the master object, excluding the label caption and the other palette in pixels. Details
Graph:Bounds Height Specifies the height of the master object, excluding the label caption and the other palette in pixels. Details
